text: “firavunge janatavage tatvayada, ovunta pera visuvange tatvaya menma (movunge) tatvayada ætteya. ovunda (movun menma) tamange deviyange sadhakayan boru karamin sitiyaha. ebævin ovunge papayanhi hetuven api (vividha vargaye danduvam magin firavunta pera visu) ovunva vinasa kara dæmu atara, firavunge janatavada gilva dæmuvemu. movun siyalla aparadhakaruvan vasayenma sitiyaha
